scripts.build: npm run build:dist && npm run build:browser
scripts.build:dist: npm run clean:dist && npm run types:gen && babel src -d dist --copy-files
scripts.build:browser: npm run build:browser:reg && npm run build:browser:min
scripts.build:browser:min: npm run clean:browser:min && cross-var browserify -r ./index.js:nlplearn -o ./browser-dist/nlplearn-$npm_package_version.min.js -g uglifyify
scripts.clean: npm run clean:dist && npm run clean:browser
scripts.clean:browser: npm run clean:browser:reg && npm run clean:browser:min
scripts.types:gen: npm run clean:types && npm run types:gen:src
scripts.types:gen:src: shx cp ./src/index.js ./src/index.d.ts && npx -p typescript tsc src/**/*.js --declaration --allowJs --emitDeclarationOnly
